trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Fortville
There were no other sightings in Fortville on or around September 6th 2008
divs: Sighting Details9-6-08 9:05 PM Local time Hamilton (SE) County 1) Observed in the sky ESE direction from my location with binoculars set on 12x magnification one disk object with rotating multicolored lights. The disk proceeded ESE from me to out of sight. Observed for about 10 minutes. 2) Unrelated to the above. Tonight there are 9 total multicolored star type objects in the sky from my vantage point. None appear to be moving. 4 due east or about 3 oclock in a arrow head pattern about 45 degrees up with a 5th directly above the arrow about 50+ degrees up. 1 at NE location or about 2 oclock about 50 degrees up. 2 at a SW location or about 8 oclock and about 45 degrees up . These are close beside each other and just near the moon. 1 at due west or 9 oclock and about 50 degrees up
Summary: 1) Disk with multicolored rotating lights 2) Nine multicolored star type objects
